content: छंद {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [छंद्-अच्] {@--1@} Pleasing, fascinating, inviting, alluring. {@--2@} Private, solitary, secret. {@--3@} Praising. --दः {@--1@} Wish, desire, fancy, liking, will; विज्ञाप्यतां देवी यस्ते छंद इति <ls>V. 3</ls> just as you like; <ls>Pt. 1. 69.</ls> {@--2@} Free will, one's own choice, whim, free or wilful conduct; षष्ठे काले त्वमपि दिवसस्यात्मनश्छं दवर्ती <ls>V. 2. 1</ls>; <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 195</ls>; स्वच्छंदं according to one's free will, independently. {@--3@} (Hence) subjection, control. {@--4@} Meaning, intention, purport. {@--5@} Poison. {@--6@} Appearance, look, shape. {@--7@} Pleasure, delight.
